title: Provides for the town of Warwick, Orange county, to control the town speed limits
summary: Provides for the town of Warwick, Orange county, to control the town speed limits.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2606

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation  to  regulating
         speed limits in the town of Warwick, county of Orange

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The first undesignated paragraph of section 1662-a  of  the
    2  vehicle  and  traffic law is designated subdivision 1 and a new subdivi-
    3  sion 2 is added to read as follows:
    4    2. THE TOWN BOARD OF WARWICK, COUNTY  OF  ORANGE,  MAY  BY  LOCAL  LAW
    5  ESTABLISH MAXIMUM SPEED LIMITS AT WHICH VEHICLES MAY PROCEED ON OR ALONG
    6  SUCH  TOWN  HIGHWAYS  IN  SUCH  TOWN OUTSIDE OF THE VILLAGES OF WARWICK,
    7  FLORIDA AND GREENWOOD LAKE, OTHER THAN STATE OR  COUNTY  HIGHWAYS  MAIN-
    8  TAINED  BY  THE STATE OR COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, LOWER THAN
    9  FIFTY-FIVE MILES PER HOUR STATUTORY MAXIMUM SPEED LIMIT. NO  SUCH  SPEED
   10  LIMIT  APPLICABLE  ON OR ALONG SUCH DESIGNATED HIGHWAYS WITHIN SUCH TOWN
   11  SHALL BE ESTABLISHED AT LESS THAN TWENTY-FIVE  MILES  PER  HOUR,  EXCEPT
   12  THAT  SCHOOL  SPEED  LIMITS  MAY BE ESTABLISHED AT NOT LESS THAN FIFTEEN
   13  MILES PER HOUR, FOR A DISTANCE NOT TO EXCEED ONE THOUSAND THREE  HUNDRED
   14  TWENTY FEET, ON A HIGHWAY PASSING A SCHOOL BUILDING, ENTRANCE OR EXIT OF
   15  A SCHOOL ABUTTING ON THE HIGHWAY.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03522-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to regulating speed limits in the town of Warwick, county of Orange
